actions.name: Chain
actions.description: Target grappled (escape DC 14) if Large or smaller; restrained while grappled.

actions.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: Up to four chains within 60 ft become animated; each an object with AC 20, 20 HP, +8 to hit, 2d6+4 slashing on hit and can grapple.
